sourcesContent:
Meetings

  • {{ meeting.name }}

    {{ meeting.startDate | date }} to {{ meeting.endDate | date }}

    {{ meeting.description }}

{{ isEditing ? 'Edit' : 'Add' }} Meeting

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; import { Meeting } from 'src/Models/Meeting'; import { MeetingService } from 'src/services/meeting.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { meetings: Meeting[] = []; currentMeeting; userId: number; isEditing = false; constructor( private meetingService: MeetingService, private formBuilder: FormBuilder ) { this.currentMeeting = this.formBuilder.group({ id: null, userId: null, name: null, startDate: null, endDate: null, description: null, document: null, }); let localUserId = localStorage.getItem("userId"); if (localUserId !== null && localUserId !== undefined) { this.userId = +localUserId; this.getAll(this.userId) } } getAll(userId: number){ this.meetingService.getAll(userId).subscribe( (response) => { this.meetings = response as Meeting[]; console.log(this.meetings); }, (error) => { console.log(error); }); }; editMeeting(meeting: Meeting){ this.isEditing = true; this.currentMeeting = { ...meeting }; } deleteMeeting(meetingId: number){ } updateMeeting(meeting: Meeting){ this.meetingService.edit(meeting).subscribe( (response) => { this.meetings = response as Meeting[]; console.log(this.meetings); }, (error) => { console.log(error); }); } }
